sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Virtualization refers to the act of creating a virtual (rather than actual) version of something.

This category contains pages about virtualization technologies such as hypervisors, hypervisor control tools, cloud management systems, etc.

Related categories:

- Category:Emulation
- Category:Simulation

sections.title: Subcategories
sections.content: This category has only the following subcategory.
